trans-unit.source: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Azure classic portal at this URL: [https://manage.windowsazure.com/](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Azure classic portal at this URL: [https://manage.windowsazure.com/](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).

trans-unit.source: If deploying the device in Government portal, log in at: [https://manage.windowsazure.us/](https://manage.windowsazure.us/)
trans-unit.target: If deploying the device in Government portal, log in at: [https://manage.windowsazure.us/](https://manage.windowsazure.us/)

trans-unit.source: In the portal, click **New > Data Services > StorSimple Manager > Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: In the portal, click **New > Data Services > StorSimple Manager > Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: In the form that is displayed, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the form that is displayed, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a unique **Name** for your service.
trans-unit.target: Supply a unique **Name** for your service.

trans-unit.source: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.
trans-unit.target: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.

trans-unit.source: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.
trans-unit.target: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.

trans-unit.source: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.
trans-unit.target: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.

trans-unit.source: For a service to manage a StorSimple virtual device, from the drop down list for **Managed devices type**, choose **Virtual device series**.
trans-unit.target: For a service to manage a StorSimple virtual device, from the drop down list for **Managed devices type**, choose **Virtual device series**.

trans-unit.source: Location refers to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.
trans-unit.target: Location refers to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.

trans-unit.source: If you have other workloads in Azure that you intend to deploy with your StorSimple device, we recommend that you use that datacenter.
trans-unit.target: If you have other workloads in Azure that you intend to deploy with your StorSimple device, we recommend that you use that datacenter.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Manager and Azure storage can be in two separate locations.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Manager and Azure storage can be in two separate locations.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, you are required to create the StorSimple Manager and Azure storage account separately.
trans-unit.target: In such a case, you are required to create the StorSimple Manager and Azure storage account separately.

trans-unit.source: To create an Azure storage account, go to the Azure Storage service in portal and follow the steps in [Create an Azure Storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account).
trans-unit.target: To create an Azure storage account, go to the Azure Storage service in portal and follow the steps in [Create an Azure Storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account).

trans-unit.source: After this account is created, add this account to the StorSimple Manager service by following the steps in [Configure a new storage account for the service](#optional-step-configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service).
trans-unit.target: After this account is created, add this account to the StorSimple Manager service by following the steps in [Configure a new storage account for the service](#optional-step-configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service).

trans-unit.source: If deploying the virtual device in the Government Portal, the StorSimple Manager service is available in US Iowa and US Virginia locations.
trans-unit.target: If deploying the virtual device in the Government Portal, the StorSimple Manager service is available in US Iowa and US Virginia locations.
